casebody.data:
David SCHWARTZ, Pat Iurilli, George Manikas and Raymond Kohler, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
BOROUGH OF HIGHLAND PARK and Scott Luthman, Defendants-Respondents. C-307 September Term 2017
079951 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 14, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002988-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
